content: and 4th stitch on the left needle drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the front with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 2/2 rc = 4 stitch right leaning cable approaching from the front insert the tip of the right needle into the 3rd and 4th stitch on the left needle as if to purl drop 4 sts off the left needle and pick up the 2 loose stitches from the back with the left needle transfer 2 stitches back from right needle to left needle k4 pattern cuff loosely cast on 72 sts and join to begin working in the round place marker for beginning of round work p2 k2 ribbing for 11 rounds leg setup work 1 round of the setup chart setup chart leg start working the leg chart repeat each chart line 6 times to complete one round on your needles work rounds 1-28 of pattern chart twice then work rounds 1-8 once more ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 2/5 bly socks - by caoua coffee note in round 12 and 21 the beginning of the round shifts by 2 sts to the left or to the right to achieve this at the beginning of round 12 you remove marker k2 replace marker continue to the end of the charted line * then start the line again this time omitting the first 2 charted sts repeat from * four more times till you reach the marker again in round 21 you work to last 2 sts of the round as charted i e you end the round after st 70 remove the marker from where it is and place it after st 70 leg chart set-up for heel flap remove marker work the next 17 sts as follows p1 k2 5times p1 k1 put next 36 sts on hold they will be worked later for instep the heel is worked back and forth over the 36 sts you have still on the needles turn your work heel flap ws sl yf k1 sl yf sl yf 11 times k1 p1 turn rs sl yb p1 k2 11 times p1 k1 turn ws sl yf k1 sl yf sl yf 11 times k1 p1 turn rs sl yb p1 k2 p1 1/1rc 5 times p1 k2 p1 k1 turn ws sl yf k1 sl yf sl yf 11 times k1 p1 turn rs sl yb p1 k2 11 times p1 k1 turn work theses 6 row 5 times i e 30 row total then work the first 2 row once more ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved bly v 1 1 page 3/5 bly socks - by caoua coffee turn heel ws sl yf p20 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k7 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to
